overview: In 2012, Italian divers discovered the wreck of the biggest aircraft in WWII, Messerschmidt "Gigant", off the coast of Sardinia. None of Hitler's mega planes survived the war, and no other wreck has ever been found 70 years after the disaster. This film takes us on a thrilling search for traces of the wreck and its victims.  - Amazon
title: Hitler's Mega Plane
